name: Chew-Man-Fu™
description: A novel action puzzle game set in the sacred towers taken over by the evil sorcerer, Chew Man Fu. It’s up to you as an apprentice female monk to free the towers, and lift Chew’s curse to bring peace and fried rice back to the land once ruled by the Egg Roll Dynasty. The rules are simple! Your objective is to clear each round by pushing, pulling or kicking four coloured orbs onto their matching coloured tiles. Beware the sorcerer’s minions in the tower who stand in your way! Kick the orbs to take your enemies out or to break down walls! Overcome the obstacles and place the orbs on their respective tiles! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price.
